item.title: Yjs
item.description: Yjs is a linked-list-based, network-agnostic [[thoughts/CRDT|CRDT]] implementation in Javascript. From GitHub Documentation Yjs supports many different transport layers:

item.title: Zooko's Triangle
item.description: Postulates that names of participants can have at most 2 of these 3 properties Human-meaningful: Meaningful and memorable (low-entropy) names are provided to the users.

item.title: Workflows
item.description: Creating modular tools for users to build their own workflows and interactions “Each person’s mind works a little differently, and each person remembers and processes information a little differently.
